enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Following further debate on Saudi Arabia`s proposal to add agenda items on implementation of UNFCCC Article 4.8 and 4.9 (FCCC/SBI/2005/1/Add.2), Chair Becker proposed that those items and a G-77/China proposed item on capacity building be included under Other Matters.
Following informal consultations, delegates accepted the Chair`s proposal and adopted the agenda (FCCC/SBI/2005/1 and Add.1).
